MS MCQs

    Introduction to high-performance computing (HPC) on Azure - Azure Batch

    »

    1. What’s the advantage of using Azure Batch, rather than provisioning the required number of VMs for the task at hand?

      Because Azure Batch is a managed service, you get a discount on the compute capacity you purchase.

      Azure Batch handles the scheduling and managing of nodes for you, free of charge.

      Only by using Azure Batch can you access the most high-performing VM SKUs on Azure.


    2. You’ve analyzed a problem and found that it has 1000 separate subtasks. To solve this problem, your boss agrees to budget 20 VM nodes to run in Azure Batch. Compared to running on a single VM node of the same size, approximately how much quicker would you expect the problem’s solution to be?

      1/50 of the time

      1/20 of the time

      The same length of time — but results are more accurate
